title: Did a KGB Agent Confirm That the Sex Pistols Were Backed by the USSR to Destabilize the West?
subtitle: A Facebook page for punk fans recirculated an old (and fake) story that the Sex Pistols were a KGB plot to foment dissent in the West.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A KGB agent admitted that the Sex Pistols were financed by the USSR to destabilize Western democracy.
